about.description:
qnm is an open-source Python package for computing the Kerr
quasinormal mode frequencies, angular separation constants,
and spherical-spheroidal mixing coefficients. The qnm package
includes a Leaver solver with the Cook-Zalutskiy spectral approach
to the angular sector, and a caching mechanism to avoid repeating
calculations.
about.summary: Package for computing Kerr quasinormal mode frequencies, separation constants, and spherical-spheroidal mixing coefficients

about.description:
qnm is an open-source Python package for computing the Kerr
quasinormal mode frequencies, angular separation constants,
and spherical-spheroidal mixing coefficients. The qnm package
includes a Leaver solver with the Cook-Zalutskiy spectral approach
to the angular sector, and a caching mechanism to avoid repeating
calculations.
about.summary: Package for computing Kerr quasinormal mode frequencies, separation constants, and spherical-spheroidal mixing coefficients

name: qnm
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "qnm" %}
{% set version = "0.4.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 53332a654858633cc67d09731b8c2817b72ed48f6dabede5f583bf3a7652aee6

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - numba
    - numpy
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - scipy <1.14.0a0
    - tqdm

test:
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
    - python {{ python_min }}
  source_files:
    - test/
  commands:
    - python -m pip check
    - python -m pip show qnm
    - python -m pytest -ra -v test/ -m 'not slow'

about:
  home: https://github.com/duetosymmetry/qnm/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Package for computing Kerr quasinormal mode frequencies, separation constants, and spherical-spheroidal mixing coefficients
  description: |
    qnm is an open-source Python package for computing the Kerr
    quasinormal mode frequencies, angular separation constants,
    and spherical-spheroidal mixing coefficients. The qnm package 
    includes a Leaver solver with the Cook-Zalutskiy spectral approach
    to the angular sector, and a caching mechanism to avoid repeating
    calculations.
  doc_url: https://qnm.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/duetosymmetry/qnm/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duetosymmetry
